TopicTitle: Looking for plain text complete part's list with statistics for V 1.0

Articles.Content: I'm looking for a simple reference guide that can be used out of guide that can show me all the stats of any given part. It can be a spreadsheet or just a list but it must be on one page. I'm wondering if anyone has compiled this before I need to go figure it out for myself. Can anyone help me out with this?
I hope you don't mean one printed page, because you'd have to drop the font down to about 0.2pt for that all to fit...
Lol, yes, me clarify. One I do not have to click links for each individual part.

I would be interested in this as well, so I can update my Delta-V calculator I made. I haven't made the time yet to add and edit the parts since the .25 release, which is when I made it.

I wonder if someone can make a script to look in the parts folder and extract all the info from the config files, or wherever the parts are stored in the game folder...
Well, someone would just have to take the time to make one.

\*large sigh\*

Perhaps I can find it in the game files. I mean the modders have to do it somehow.

Id have to move it to Linux, because I have no scripting skills in Windows.

This is page has a part list with stats ... probably as close as you're going to get, and it might be partially outdated:

[http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Parts](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Parts)
